Name: Glow Ball - The billiard puzzle game
About the game: Physics based puzzle game type of billiards. If you like billiard games or love pool then this game is for you! Features: - New view on the game of billiards - Unusual and challenging levels - Each level is unique in its design - Each level has its own innovations - Beautiful dynamic lighting - The leisurely meditative gameplay - Atmospheric soundtrack Music in video: 'Cool Vibes' Kevin MacLeod (incompetech com)
